remarks: Add meet to both sides of a lattice ordering.  ( ~ sslin analog.) (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-2011.)
statement:
latmle.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
latmle.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
latmle.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
latmlem2 $p |- ( ( K e. Lat /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( X .<_ Y -> ( Z ./\ X ) .<_ ( Z ./\ Y ) ) ) $.
